name: Cygwin-installer
tagline: Cygwin install and preconfigure script (for yourself or a full team of users)
body:
# Cygwin-installer
**What it does:** Installs latest Cygwin, includes your list of packages, and preconfigures profile for you.
1. Gets install.exe from Cygwin.com
1. Runs unattended install including custom list of packages
1. Inserts custom configuration (shared team config, your file replication location, etc.)
**What you do:** Run Install-Cygwin.bat, then open Cygwin prompt to start working!
**What your team does:** Runs the admin/tooling lead's customized version of Install-Cygwin.bat, then starts working with team-preconfigured Cygwin.

# Support and feedback
* inline comments document key parts of script
* [Issues List](https://github.com/zephans/cygwin-installer/issues)
Curated and extended with love and desperation by @zephans. 

# Thanks to 
* @miguelgrinberg for the [parent cygwin-installer project](https://github.com/miguelgrinberg/cygwin-installer) (especially the inline .vbs create&execute). 
* @stephenmm for [auto-install-cygwin](https://github.com/stephenmm/auto-install-cygwin) which has similar concepts plus some cool ideas for core file replication (via junctions to existing dropbox folders).
* @mojmir-svoboda for [GetFile.vbs concept](https://gist.github.com/mojmir-svoboda/02bb4b683ec14d9bb9c1)
* @wjrogers for [install.bat](https://gist.github.com/wjrogers/1016065)... one of the ancestors of this project
* everyone else who has donated time, tips, and ideas to make Cygwin easier to quickly install and get ready for real work.

Curated and extended with love (and desperate need) by @zephans. Change frequence indicates how close to "done" this project is. Code churn by definition means project is less stable or has issue(s) being worked on :-).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
